allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(6.4-6.5\): generation API and job processor with safety

6.4 - Generation API:
- POST /api/generate - Start generation job with safety checks
- GET /api/generate/[jobId] - Job status with thumbnails
- POST /api/generate/[jobId]/cancel - Cancel and refund blots

6.5 - Job Processor:
- processGenerationJob with batch processing \(3 concurrent\)
- planAndCompile integration with safety blocking
- Retry support \(max 2\) for failed pages
- R2 upload and page version creation

Also adds metadata JSONB column to jobs table for storing idea.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''https://api.resend.com/emails'' -Method Post -Headers @{Authorization=''Bearer re_idx2AGeC_3S57bhXr2rc83oL4iMVGagRB''; ''Content-Type''=''application/json''} -Body ''{""from"": ""noreply@myjoe.app"", ""to"": ""hello@myjoe.com"", ""subject"": ""Myjoe SMTP Test"", ""html"": ""

SMTP is working!

Your Resend integration is configured correctly.

""}''")

Bash(powershell -Command "$body = @{from=''noreply@myjoe.app''; to=''hello@myjoe.com''; subject=''Myjoe SMTP Test''; html=''

SMTP is working!

Your Resend integration is configured correctly.

''} | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''https://api.resend.com/emails'' -Method Post -Headers @{Authorization=''Bearer re_idx2AGeC_3S57bhXr2rc83oL4iMVGagRB''; ''Content-Type''=''application/json''} -Body $body")

Bash(node -e "fetch\(''https://api.resend.com/emails'', {method: ''POST'', headers: {''Authorization'': ''Bearer re_idx2AGeC_3S57bhXr2rc83oL4iMVGagRB'', ''Content-Type'': ''application/json''}, body: JSON.stringify\({from: ''Myjoe '', to: ''hello@myjoe.app'', subject: ''Myjoe SMTP Test'', html: ''

SMTP is working!

Your Resend integration is configured correctly.

''}\)}\).then\(r => r.json\(\)\).then\(console.log\).catch\(console.error\)")
